QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Sputum Gram stain
QAPair.Answer: A sputum Gram stain is a laboratory test used to detect bacteria in a sputum sample. Sputum is the material that comes up from your air passages when you cough very deeply. The Gram stain method is one of the most commonly used methods to rapidly identify the type of bacteria in a bacterial infection, including pneumonia.
